. </revisionDesc>
. </teiHeader>
. <text xml:space="preserve">
. <body><div type="edition" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">
200
.
. <div type="chapter" n="1" xml:id="siksaGuru_01">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Pure Circle of Three Bodily Domains</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_01.01"><pb edRef="#A" n="1v"/><pb edRef="#B" n="1v"/><app><lem wit="#A #B">ndah nihan</lem><rdg wit="#C"><lacunaStart/></rdg></app> varahakna mami rumuhun ri saṅ sevaka dharma, katəkan kita ruməṅə̄kəna
205 <app><lem wit="#B">kavivekan</lem><rdg wit="#A">kaviven</rdg></app> saṅ hyaṅ dharma, mvaṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">kabyavasthānikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kabyaṁvasṭanikaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kabyavas·tanika</rdg></app> saṅ hyaṅ ajñāna, hana
. <app><lem type="norm">trikāya maṇḍala</lem><rdg wit="#A">trakayamandala</rdg><rdg wit="#B">trikaya man·dala</rdg></app> pariśuddha,
. <app><lem wit="#B">ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅa</rdg></app>, inujarakən saṅ paṇḍita ri saṅ sevaka dharma, nyāpan tahan
. <app><lem type="emn">kveki</lem><rdg wit="#A">kvaki</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kvakiṅ</rdg></app> ulah śabda lavan ambək,
210 <app><lem type="emn">yan kva</lem><rdg wit="#A">yekva</rdg><rdg wit="#B">yekvaṁ</rdg></app> hana
. <app><lem type="norm">ma<pb edRef="#B" n="2r"/>lina</lem><rdg wit="#A">malina:</rdg><rdg wit="#B">maṁline</rdg></app> ri
. <app><lem type="emn">hr̥dayanta</lem><rdg wit="#A">pr̥ḍayanta</rdg><rdg wit="#B">prədayan·ta</rdg></app>, ya teka
. <app><lem type="emn">prih</lem><rdg wit="#A">praḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">prəh</rdg></app>-pəgəṅən<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> rakṣa pahayu juga ya, apan
. <app><lem type="emn">hetuniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hentaniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">hentuniṁ</rdg></app>
215 <app><lem wit="#B">manəmvakən</lem><rdg wit="#A">manimvakən</rdg></app> sukhaduhkha halahayu.</p>
.
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_01.02">yan pinahala ulahta, śabdanta,
. <app><lem type="norm">ambəkta</lem><rdg wit="#B">Ambhəkta</rdg><rdg wit="#A">Ambhakta</rdg></app>, niyata
. <app><lem type="norm">kapaṅguhnikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">kapaguḥnikaṁ</rdg></app> hala denta yan
220 <app><lem wit="#A #B">maṅkana</lem><rdg wit="#C"><lacunaEnd/>kana</rdg></app>, yan pinahayu ulahta, <pb edRef="#A" n="2r"/>
. <app><lem type="norm">śabdanta</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">sabdata</rdg><rdg wit="#C">sabḍanta</rdg></app>, ambəkta, avas kapaṅguhnikaṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">hayunta</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">hayuta</rdg></app> yan maṅkana,
. <app><lem wit="#C">ya ta</lem><rdg wit="#A #B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> mataṅyan hana paribhāṣa kumvaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">madyus-dyus</lem><rdg wit="#B">ḍyas·ḍyas·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">maḍyas·</rdg></app> vvay tinəmunya
225 <app><lem type="emn">kasvabhāvaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">kasvambhavaniṁ</rdg></app> janma, hala tuməmu halanya, hayu tuməmu hayunya, maṅkana
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">lvirniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">lvarniṁ</rdg></app> janma.</p>
.
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_01.03">ndya dr̥ṣṭānta, iriki dadyanya, hala deniṅ halanya, hayu deniṅ hayunya, nihan upadyanta, hana ya maṇik anargha ṅaranya, tan
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">kinavruhan</lem><rdg wit="#B">kinavraḥhan·</rdg></app> mulyanya,
230 <app><lem wit="#A">tan paprameya* ri</lem><rdg wit="#B">tan paprameyani</rdg><rdg wit="#C">tala prameyaniṁ</rdg></app> rahayu, kaliṅanya ikaṅ maṇik anargha, lavan maṇik
. <app><lem type="emn">sarveṣṭa</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṣavesṭaṭā</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ṣavesṭa</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ṣavesṭa ṭā</rdg></app>, yogya karikāpusənta ri gaṅsa, tambaga lavan timah,<pb edRef="#C" n="2v"/> aparan ta yogyanika, niyatār <pb edRef="#A" n="2v"/> mijil śrīnika lavan dhanuhnika, maṅka pva
. <app><lem wit="#C">yogya</lem><rdg wit="#A">yvagya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">gyapa</rdg></app> paṅapusanta irikaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikətanta irikaṅ maṇik
. <app><lem type="norm">sarveṣṭa</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">ṣavesṭa</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ṣarves·ṭā</rdg></app>.</p>
.
235 <p xml:id="siksaGuru_01.04">nihan
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">liṅnira</lem><rdg wit="#C">liṁnya</rdg></app> ri saṅ hyaṅ śāstra <q><foreign>ləpas ca
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">vuṁkunuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#C">buṁkuniṁ</rdg></app> ceva, adhika udika
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">tatte</lem><rdg wit="#C">taheṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">tatur tathya tuṅgəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#C">tutur tatanagəṁ</rdg></app>,
240 <app><lem type="emn">etad eva</lem><rdg wit="#A #B"/><rdg wit="#C">tapad eva</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">nigadyate</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">nigaḍyate</rdg><rdg wit="#C">niṁgadyate</rdg></app></foreign></q>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">apan</lem><rdg wit="#C">hapa</rdg></app> sinaṅguh rambut ləpas ṅaranya, vulu pasagi ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#C">hana vuṁkunuṁ ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#A #B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, hana uḍika, hana tater, hana sorasa ṅaranya, ika ta
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">kabaih yogya karika paṅapusan ta irikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app>
245 <app><lem wit="#A #B">maṇik anargha</lem><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="3"/>narga</rdg></app>, paṅikətanta irikaṅ maṇik
. <app><lem type="norm">sarveṣṭa</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">ṣavesṭa</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ṣarvesṭa</rdg></app>, taham pih yāpusən ta ri gaṅsa tambaga lavan timah, aparan ta yogyanika, paṅapusan ta irikaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikə<pb edRef="#A" n="3r"/>tan ta irikaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭa, nahan
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">liṅnya</lem><rdg wit="#C">lvirnya</rdg></app> ri saṅ hyaṅ śāstra, <q><foreign>ləpas ca vuṁkunuṅ
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">ceva</lem><rdg wit="#A">cova</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm">adhika</lem><rdg wit="#A">Aḍi Ikaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Adik·ka</rdg><rdg wit="#C">Aḍikara</rdg></app>,
250 <app><lem type="emn">uḍika</lem><rdg wit="#A">Uḍi Ika:</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Uḍi Ika</rdg><rdg wit="#C">dika</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">tater</lem><rdg wit="#C">tatai</rdg></app> tatur tathya tuṅgəṅ nu
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">yogyanika</lem><rdg wit="#C">yogunika</rdg></app></foreign></q>.
. </p>
.
255 <p xml:id="siksaGuru_01.05">hana ya mas kanaka
. <app><lem type="emn">santaṅva</lem><rdg wit="#A">santaṅvaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">san·ta</rdg><rdg wit="#C">savtaṅoṁ</rdg></app>* ṅaranya, mas kanaka jātirūpa, sakati mulyanya,
. <app><lem type="conj">vrəttya</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">vrət</rdg><rdg wit="#C">vr<unclear>uḥ</unclear>nya</rdg></app> inapisan pituṅ apitu, matəmahan ta ya satahil i
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">vatu</lem><rdg wit="#A">vasta</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">bratnya</lem><rdg wit="#B">branya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">bratnyanya</rdg></app>, ndya ya teka tuṅgəṅ,
260 <app><lem type="norm">tan limbak</lem><rdg wit="#A">tan libak</rdg><rdg wit="#B">tan limbhak</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ganaləm·bak</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">ləgə</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">ləgəṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">tan L̥viḥ</rdg></app>, an i<pb edRef="#C" n="3v"/>napi muvah, apan samaṅkana juga,
. <app><lem type="norm">pinakādiniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥkaḍaḍiniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pinakaḍiniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">pinakadiniṁ</rdg></app> mas kabaih, ndah ya teka yogya rahayu paṅapusanta irikaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikətanta irikaṅ maṇik
. <app><lem type="emn">sarveṣṭa</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">ṣavesṭa</rdg></app>.</p>
.
265 <p xml:id="siksaGuru_01.06">ya ta kāpusan deni
. <app><lem wit="#B">gaṅsa</lem><rdg wit="#A">naṁsa</rdg><rdg wit="#C">gaṅśa</rdg></app> ta<pb edRef="#A" n="3v"/>mbaga lavan timah,<pb edRef="#B" n="5r"/> tar mijil śrīnika lavan dhanuhnika,
. <app><lem wit="#A">aparan</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">paran</rdg></app> tar
. <app><lem type="norm">yuktinika</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">uk·tinika</rdg></app>, salah nija<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> salah karma, salah
. <app><lem type="norm">svabhava</lem><rdg wit="#A">svara, bava</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sora, bava</rdg><rdg wit="#C">sobava</rdg></app> ṅaranika, iva maṅkana ta saṅ hyaṅ dharma viśeṣa, sira maṇik anargha, ṅuniveh avakta<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> yeka maṇik sarveṣṭa ṅaranya.</p>
270
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_01.07">ndah ta yāṅkən gaṅsa tambaga lavan timah, ika tan yogya
. <app><lem wit="#A">rakətakəna</lem><rdg wit="#B">ra:kən·takəna</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/>kətaka</rdg></app> iri<pb edRef="#B" n="5v"/>kaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikətanta irikaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭa.</p>
.
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_01.08">nihan ya<pb edRef="#C" n="4r"/><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ulah mahala, śabda tar yukti,
275 <app><lem type="norm">ambək</lem><rdg wit="#B">Ambhək</rdg><rdg wit="#A #C">Ambhak</rdg></app> magələh ri kapva
. <app><lem wit="#B">kaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṭā</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app> janma, ṅuniveh ri saṅ paṇḍita, kaliṅanya tan yogya kari ulah mahala<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> śabda tar yukti, ambək magələh, rasā<pb edRef="#A" n="4r"/>kən i saṅ hyaṅ dharma, lavan
. <app><lem wit="#C">rakṣa ri</lem><rdg wit="#A">Arakṣa</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ri sari</rdg></app> śarīranta, ṅuni<pb edRef="#B" n="6r"/>veh ri saṅ paṇḍita,
. <app><lem wit="#C">taham pih</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">taham asiḥ</rdg></app> tar yukti ika,
. <app><lem type="norm">punaruktanikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">punaḥruktaḥnikaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">punaḥrutaḥnikaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">punaḥruktaḥnikaṁ</rdg></app> kavvaṅanta, hilaṅ masihniṅ
280 <app><lem wit="#A #C">manak</lem><rdg wit="#B">mavak</rdg></app> maṅrabi,
. <app><lem type="emn">manak</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">manik</rdg></app> makadaṅ mvaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">renanta</lem><rdg wit="#B">renakta</rdg></app>, ya tan vnaṅ rumakṣa ikaṅ ulah mahala śabda tar yukti ambək magələh ri
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">kapva</lem><rdg wit="#C">kapadan·</rdg></app> kaṅ janma, ṅuniveh ri saṅ sādhu,
. <app><lem wit="#B">ndya</lem><rdg wit="#A"><add place="below">na</add>dyi</rdg><rdg wit="#C">nya</rdg></app> yogya paṅrakṣanta, ri śarīranta,
285 <app><lem wit="#A">yeka</lem><rdg wit="#B">yekvaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">yekeṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">santaṅva liṅ saṅ paṇḍita</lem><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app>, kanaka santaṅva ṅaranya,<pb edRef="#B" n="6v"/> ulah rahayu, śabda rahayu, ambək rahayu, ya
. <app><lem type="norm">rakṣākəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">rakṣakəna</rdg><rdg wit="#B">rasakən</rdg><rdg wit="#C">harakṣakən i</rdg></app> saṅ hyaṅ dharma.
. </p>
.
290 <p xml:id="siksaGuru_01.09">nihan mataṅyan trikāya maṇḍala pariśuddha ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, tri ṅaraniṅ təlu<supplied reason="implied">,</supplied> śuddha ta ya
. <app><lem type="norm">trikāya</lem><rdg wit="#A">trakaya</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">trikaya</rdg></app> maṇḍaləm,
. <app><lem type="emn">ityuktam</lem><rdg wit="#A">Ityatəm</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Itikyatəm</rdg><rdg wit="#C">Itityatəm·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">nahan</lem><rdg wit="#B #A #C">nihan</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">trikāya</lem><rdg wit="#A">trakaya</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">trikaya</rdg></app> liṅ saṅ paṇḍita.</p>
295
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_01.10"><app><lem wit="#B #C">nihan</lem><rdg wit="#A">niha</rdg></app> təmbəynya* sih saṅ paṇḍita ri saṅ sevaka dharma, pariśuddha ta ri
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">ambək</lem><rdg wit="#B">Ambhəka</rdg></app> rahayu,
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">usən</lem><rdg wit="#A">Usin</rdg></app> hayva kasəlapan ambək magələh, nirmalaṁ
. <app><lem type="norm">hr̥dayam</lem><rdg wit="#A">radayəm</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">hradayəm</rdg></app> citam, ndah pahaliṅlaṅ
300 <app><lem wit="#B">kaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #C">taṁ</rdg></app> manah
. <app><lem type="emn">pvāmbək</lem><rdg wit="#A">pvambhik</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pva ma:bək</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><unclear>mət·tə</unclear></rdg></app> tiṅət maṅaṅən-aṅən<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> prihən
. <app><lem type="emn">bhikṣā-lakṣanam</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">bhəkṣalakṣanəm</rdg></app>*.
. </p>
.
305 <p xml:id="siksaGuru_01.11">nihan <app><lem wit="#A #B">lakṣaṇanta viku</lem><rdg wit="#C">lakṣananiku</rdg></app>, hayva tr̥ṣṇa ri hulun juga, byakta taṅ ra<pb edRef="#C" n="5r"/>mbut pinəgatan, ya
. <app><lem wit="#A">ta</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">tan</rdg></app> pəgati, tan
. <app><lem type="emn">kavighāta</lem><rdg wit="#A">kavigataḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kivigata</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ki<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="3"/></rdg></app> malaṅ kva hana, ya tika pariśuddha
. <app><lem type="norm">timpalakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">timpalakənkan</rdg><rdg wit="#B">timpalakəna</rdg><rdg wit="#C">tumpalakəna</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#C">kunaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">kuna</rdg></app> rətakəna, ya ta mas
310 <app><lem wit="#A" rend="check">r̥kr̥t</lem><rdg wit="#C">ritri</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> masəkar vañva ṅaranya, maṅkana ta kita maseva<pb edRef="#A" n="5r"/>ka <foreign xml:lang="osn-Latn"><app><lem wit="#A #B">di</lem><rdg wit="#C">ri</rdg></app></foreign> saṅ paṇḍita, hayva ta kita gumavayakəna guru-<app><lem wit="#A" rend="hyphenleft">talpaka</lem><rdg wit="#B">talapakanya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">talapakan·</rdg></app>, jagat-upadrava,
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">katakuta</lem><rdg wit="#A">kathakutan·</rdg></app> ri sira,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">bhaktyānukul</lem><rdg wit="#C">bak·tyanuṁkul</rdg></app> ta kita ri saṅ guru, gavayakəna
. <app><lem type="emn">kasupraṇata</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">kasuprana</rdg></app>, <foreign xml:lang="osn-Latn"><app><lem wit="#A #B">di</lem><rdg wit="#C">ri</rdg></app></foreign><!--OS--> saṅ guru, təka ri saṅ paṇḍita, dataṅ ta ri kasādhyanya.
. </p>
315
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_01.12">maṅkana ta kita hulun ri saṅ paṇḍita, ṅuniveh ri saṅ prabhu, tar gavayakəna prabhu
. <app><lem type="emn">drohaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">dvahak·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">dvahaka</rdg><rdg wit="#C">dohaka</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm">dəṇḍana vinigraha</lem><rdg wit="#A">dəndana vinigraha</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">dəndana vigraha</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">katakuta</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">tatuta</rdg></app> ri sira, marapvan
320 <app><lem type="emn">tan</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">ta</rdg></app> kita na
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">kajval</lem><rdg wit="#B">kajvala</rdg></app> pati biṣama,
. <app><lem type="norm">bhaktya</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">baktya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">byaktya</rdg></app> ta kita ri
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> prabhu, mataṅyan təka ri
. <app><lem type="norm">kasādhyanya</lem><rdg wit="#C">kasadyanya</rdg><rdg wit="#A">kadaḍyanya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kasanḍyanya</rdg></app>,
325 <app><lem wit="#C">maṅkana</lem><rdg wit="#B #A">makana</rdg></app> ta kita rāma,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">kalaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app>, gusti, patih ri banva, kunaṅ dharma tulājñānaniṅ kadi kita, hayva ta kita ti<pb edRef="#A" n="5v"/>mpaṅ svara ri byavahāra, tan
. <app><lem wit="#C">paṅivakən təṅən</lem><rdg wit="#A">paṅivakə təṅən</rdg><rdg wit="#B">paṅivakən təṅə</rdg></app> ri guṇadosa, tar yukti purihniṅ vvaṅ atuha, ujar saṅ hyaṅ āgama, hayva tutakənanta, ya ta mataṅyan tar katəkan
. <app><lem type="norm">trikāyamaṇḍalam cittam</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">tr̥kaya mandaləm citəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">trikaya man·ḍaL̥m cət:əm·</rdg></app>, nihan saṅ hyaṅ trikāya maṇḍala pariśuddha ṅaranya, kayatnakəna saṅ sevaka dharma, ya təmbəynya sih saṅ paṇḍita, ri saṅ sevaka dharma.</p>
. </div>
330
. <div type="chapter" n="2" xml:id="siksaGuru_02">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Ten Virtues (a)</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_02.01">ika hana <app><lem wit="#B #C">ta</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">kapiṇḍva</lem><rdg wit="#A">kapindva</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kapidva</rdg><rdg wit="#C">kapidvanya</rdg></app>
335 <app><lem wit="#B #C">sih</lem><rdg wit="#A">Asiḥ</rdg></app> saṅ paṇḍita ri saṅ sevaka dharma, ya daśa-śīla ṅaranya, ndya ya nihan,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">śrotra</term></lem><rdg wit="#A #B">svaṭā</rdg><rdg wit="#C">sotra</rdg><note>The list of ten organs is based on <ptr target="#A"/>, <ptr target="#B"/> and <ptr target="#C"/> contain a different list, i.e., <foreign>svaṭā, təvək, cakṣuḥ, jihvā, ghrāna, vāk, pāṇi, pada, pāyū, upastha</foreign>. This implies to the different order on their explanations. Despite the order, both mss. generaly share the same readings in the explanation of each ter- m, so I record every variant in the apparatus.</note></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">cakṣuh</term>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">ghrāṇa</term>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">jihvā</term>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">vāk</term>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">tvak</term>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">pāṇi</term>,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">pāyūpastha</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">payu:pasṭa</rdg><rdg wit="#B">payu, pas·tra</rdg><rdg wit="#C">payu, pastra</rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">pāda</term>,
.
. <app><lem wit="#A #B #C"><foreign>ini</foreign></lem><note>All manuscripts have the same reading. This word is not attested in OJ, but is common in OS. I consider it as OS intervention.</note></app> rəṅə̄kəna saṅ sevaka dharma.
340 <app><lem wit="#A #B #C"><foreign>ini</foreign></lem><note>All manuscripts have the same reading. This word is not attested in OJ, but is common in OS. I consider it as OS intervention.</note></app> rəṅə̄kəna saṅ sevaka dharma.</p>
.
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_02.02"><app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">śrotra</term></lem><rdg wit="#A #B">svaṭā</rdg><rdg wit="#C">sotra</rdg></app> ṅaraniṅ taliṅa, apa viṣayaniṅ taliṅa,<pb edRef="#A" n="6r"/>
. <app><lem type="norm">pinakadvāraniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinakaḍvaraniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pinadvaraniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">pinakadvaraniṁ</rdg></app> maṅrəṅə̄ ikaṅ śabda hala hayu,
. <app><lem wit="#B">maṅrəṅə̄</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅə</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ṅaR̥ṅə</rdg></app> kita śabda
345 <app><lem wit="#B #C">manis arum</lem><rdg wit="#A">hu<add place="below">ma</add>:sa:rum·</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> enak manahta,
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">maṅrəṅə̄</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅa</rdg></app> pva kita śabda mahala,
. <app><lem type="emn">sākṣāt</lem><rdg wit="#A">səsə</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">sakṣak</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">tan kahiḍəp</lem><rdg wit="#A">ta<add place="below">ka</add>na hdap·</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">tan ahidəpən·</rdg></app> doṣanika, tan
. <app><lem type="emn">piniṇḍvakən</lem><rdg wit="#A #C">paniḍakən</rdg><rdg wit="#B">paniḍvakən</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
350 <app><lem type="norm">kārya</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">karya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ka:rta</rdg></app> hayu ri saṅ guru, ya ta
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">kayatnakəna</lem><rdg wit="#C">kayatna</rdg></app> saṅ sevaka dharma, tuli maṅrəṅə̄ aji
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">sa</rdg></app> viku.</p>
.
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_02.03"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">cakṣuh</term> ṅaraniṅ mata, apa visayaniṅ mata, anon

. <app><lem wit="#B #C">ika</lem><rdg wit="#A">I</rdg></app> aveh

. <app><lem wit="#A">aveh</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">paveḥ</rdg></app> duhkha, mulata mas ri paḍanya janma len saka rika,
360 <app><lem wit="#A">lumaku</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">lumakva</rdg></app> ta kita mareṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">sabhān</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">sabaAn·</rdg></app>,

375

. <app><lem type="norm">trikāya</lem><rdg wit="#A">trakaya</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">trikaya</rdg></app> paramārtha, ya ta mataṅyan prihən kayatnakəna ikaṅ viṣayaniṅ iruṅ, de saṅ sevaka dharma.</p>

405 <p xml:id="siksaGuru_02.06"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">vāk</term> ṅaraniṅ śabda,

. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_02.10"><app><lem type="emn"><term>upastha</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">pasṭa</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#C">paṣtra</rdg></app>

. <app><lem wit="#B #C">kayatnakəna saṅ sevaka dharma</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>.</p>

. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_02.11"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">pāda</term>
465 <app><lem wit="#A #C">ṅaraniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">raniṁ</rdg></app> suku,
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">apa visayaniṅ suku</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, lumaku
. <app><lem type="norm">asiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hasiṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">hasi</rdg><rdg wit="#C">yasi</rdg></app> saparanta, yar maṅalvar maṅiḍul, maṅulvan maṅetan, atava
. <app><lem type="emn">anrap ta</lem><rdg wit="#A">Anap·tra</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Apas·tra</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app> sila, kunaṅ deyanta maṅrakṣa suku, tan paḍəḍəlan, tan
. <app><lem type="norm">paṅraṅ<pb edRef="#B" n="13v"/>kakan</lem><rdg wit="#A">parikakan</rdg><rdg wit="#B">parakakan</rdg><rdg wit="#C">paraṁkakan·</rdg></app> tan
470 <app><lem type="norm">pamagah-magahan</lem><rdg wit="#A">pamaga-magahan·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pamaṁgamaṁgahan·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">pamaṁgaAn·</rdg></app>, tan pamire-mire, tan
. <app><lem type="emn">paluṇḍu</lem><rdg wit="#A">pakilunda</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pakilunḍu</rdg><rdg wit="#C">pakilun·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">tan padvaṅdaṅ*</lem><rdg wit="#B">tan padodaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="5"/></rdg></app> ri harəpən saṅ guru, ri paramābhyāgata kabaih, nihan ta rumakṣa suku, kayatnakəna saṅ sevaka dharma.</p>
.
. </div>
475 <div type="chapter" n="3" xml:id="siksaGuru_03">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Five Instructions (ā)</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_03.01"><app><lem wit="#A #B">nihan ta</lem><rdg wit="#C" cause="lexical">hana</rdg></app> kapintiganya sih saṅ paṇḍita, ri saṅ sevaka dharma, ni<pb edRef="#A" n="9v"/>han pañca-śikṣā ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ndya ya</lem><rdg wit="#B">ndya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">nədya ya</rdg></app> nihan,</p>
.<quote xml:lang="san-Latn">
480<lg xml:id="siksaGuru_03.02" met="anuṣṭubh">
. <l n="a">akrodho
. <app><lem type="emn">guruśuśruṣā</lem><rdg wit="#A">gurususra</rdg><rdg wit="#B">gurusrusa</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="b"><app><lem type="emn">śaucam</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">sucyam</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/>m</rdg></app> āhāralāghavam,</l>
. <l n="c"><app><lem type="conj">apramādaś ca pañca vaite</lem><rdg wit="#A">Apramaḍasvateḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Apramadasvate</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hapramaḍasvat<add place="below">e</add></rdg></app>,</l>
485 <l n="d"><app><lem type="norm">niyamāḥ</lem><rdg wit="#A">niyamaḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">niyama</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">parikīrtitāḥ</lem><rdg wit="#A">sarikəta:taḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">parikititaḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">parikitataḥ</rdg></app>.</l>
.</lg>
. <listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
490 <note>The same stanza is found in VS.4 and Vr̥h.61.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.
. </quote>
495
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_03.03"><app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">akrodho</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">Anakroda:dva</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Akrodva</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hakroḍa:</rdg></app> ṅaranya, tar dadi ika saṅ sevaka dharma,
. <app><lem type="emn">mentonakən</lem><rdg wit="#A">mentona:kəna:</rdg><rdg wit="#B">men·tvan·kən·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">metonakən·</rdg></app> krodhanya i harəpən saṅ guru, ṅuniveh i
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">para sujanma</lem><rdg wit="#C">para sup·jakma</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">kabaih</lem><rdg wit="#B">kabeḥhan·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">keb<add place="below">e</add>han·</rdg></app>,
500 <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">guruśuśruṣā</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">gurususra</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">gurusrusa</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">bakty anukul</lem><rdg wit="#B">bakty anuṁkulan</rdg><rdg wit="#C">bakotyanuṁkulan</rdg></app> ta kita ri saṅ guru, tar madvah ri suku saṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">matuha</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">guru</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#C">maṅkana</lem><rdg wit="#A">tuhu makana</rdg><rdg wit="#B">makana</rdg></app> yar hana pa<pb edRef="#B" n="15v"/>kvan saṅ guru, pariśuddha ta
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">kunaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">kuna</rdg></app>,
505 <app><lem wit="#A">kayatnakəna</lem><rdg wit="#B">katnakna</rdg><rdg wit="#C">tayatnakna</rdg></app> taṅ trikāya paramārtha, ya
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">ulah</lem><rdg wit="#A">Uvaḥ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">rahayu</lem><rdg wit="#B">rayu</rdg></app>, śabda rahayu, ambək rahayu, advah
. <app><lem wit="#C">aparək</lem><rdg wit="#A">paR̥k</rdg><rdg wit="#B">hapaR̥k·</rdg></app> kayatnakna ikaṅ trikāya maṇḍala <pb edRef="#A" n="10r"/>
. <app><lem type="norm">pariśuddha</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">parisuda</rdg><rdg wit="#C">parisada</rdg></app>, mvaṅ daśa-śīla, pañca-śikṣā,
510 <app><lem type="emn">nahan</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">nihan</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">kaśuśrūṣāniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kasusraniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kasrususaniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">kasrasuniṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">maṅguru</lem><rdg wit="#C">saṁ guru</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">śauca</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">sucy<del rend="strikeout">e</del>a</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">sucya</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#B">masəhan</lem><rdg wit="#A">masiḥhan</rdg><rdg wit="#C">masihan</rdg></app> taṅan
515 <app><lem wit="#A">yan</lem><rdg wit="#B">karmananiṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ajña kamnaṁniṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#C">magaməlan</lem><rdg wit="#A">gamələn</rdg><rdg wit="#B">magamələn</rdg></app> taḍahən saṅ guru, ṅuniveh drabya hyaṅ saṅ paṇḍita,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">āhāralāghava</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">Aragavəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Aralagavəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">haralagavə</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm">śīghra</lem><rdg wit="#A">sagraḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">sigra</rdg></app> ta
. <app><lem type="norm">kitānaḍah</lem><rdg wit="#A">kitanadaḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kita nənḍaḥ nḍaḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">vi<add place="below">da</add>naḥ</rdg></app>,
520 <app><lem type="norm">agəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hagəṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">pahagəṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">kəpəl</lem><rdg wit="#C">təpəl</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">kāmakāra</lem><rdg wit="#A">kama ri</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kumarak</rdg><rdg wit="#C">humarak</rdg></app> śīghrānaḍah, hayva ta kita
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">maṅkana</lem><rdg wit="#B">makana</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#C">ya kukṣi</lem><rdg wit="#A">tan kasi</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ya kuksi</rdg></app> pura ṅaranya, umapa pva deniṅ manaḍah kaliṅanya, ya ta prāṇa sadhāraṇa juga upajīvaniṅ
525 <app><lem wit="#B #C">umaṅən-aṅən</lem><rdg wit="#A">Umaṅina:ṅən</rdg></app> saṅ hyaṅ hayu,
. nihan pañca-śikṣā ṅaranya, kayatnakəna saṅ sevaka dharma.
.
. </p>
. <listApp type="parallels">
530 <app>
. <note corresp="Vrh_61">Vr̥h.61: <foreign><term xml:lang="san-Latn">akrodha</term> ṅaranya tan bvat sərəṅən, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">guruśuśrūṣā</term> ṅaranya bhakty aguru, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">śauca</term> ṅaranya nitya majapa maradina śarīra, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">āhāralāghava</term> ṅaranya tan abvat iṅ pinaṅan, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">apramāda</term> ṅaranya tan paləhpaləha, pəṅpəṅən ikaṅ hurip sādhana niṅ magavaya yogasamādhi, hayva hinələmhələm, gavayakəna tekaṅ sādhana, sādhana ṅaranya ikaṅ yogamārga, makalarapan daśa-śīla, ikaṅ daśa-śīla umaṅunakən ikaṅ yoga</foreign>.</note>
. <note corresp="VS.04">VS.04: <foreign><term xml:lang="san-Latn">akrodha</term> ṅaraniṅ tan kataman srəṅən. <term xml:lang="san-Latn">guruśuśrūṣā</term> ṅaraniṅ lot umulahakən siddhaniṅ svakāryaniṅ guru, gurubhakti kaliṅanya riṅ maṅkana, makanimitta hyuniran ruməṅvakən sarinahasyaniṅ varahvarah saṅ guru. <term xml:lang="san-Latn">śauca</term> ṅaraniṅ nityaśah mācamana sūryasevana ṅarcana ri bhaṭāra. <term xml:lang="san-Latn">āhāralāghava</term> ṅaraniṅ tan baraṅbaraṅ iṅ pinaṅan, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">apramāda</term> ṅaraniṅ tan paləhpaləh, an aṅabhyāsa ri saṅ hyaṅ kabhujaṅgan. ika ta kalima niyamabrata ṅa, liṅ bhaṭāra śiva</foreign>. Cf. SMG 8.2.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
535 </div>
.
. <div type="chapter" n="4" xml:id="siksaGuru_04">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Instructions of the Dharma</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_04.01">nihan
540 <app><lem wit="#A #C">kapiṅpatnya</lem><rdg wit="#B">kapipatnya</rdg></app> sih
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">sa</rdg></app> paṇḍita, ri saṅ sevaka dharma, <foreign xml:lang="osn-Latn">ini</foreign> dharma-śikṣā ṅaranya, ndya ya<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> nihan
. <app><lem type="norm">ślo<pb edRef="#A" n="10v"/>kanya</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">silokanya</rdg></app>,</p>
.
. <lg xml:id="siksaGuru_04.02" xml:lang="san-Latn" met="anuṣṭubh">
545 <l n="a"><app><lem type="norm">ālekhyam</lem><rdg wit="#A">Alekyəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Alekyam·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">halekyama:</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">hasitam</lem><rdg wit="#A">citəm</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#C">masitən·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">gītam</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">gətəm</rdg><rdg wit="#C">gitəm</rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="b"><app><lem type="norm">jr̥mbhanam</lem><rdg wit="#A">jraḥbanəm</rdg><rdg wit="#B">jrəmbhanəm</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hajrəmbhanəm·</rdg></app>
. kadaranəm, </l>
550 <l n="c"><app><lem type="emn">śuddham ca phalarahasyam</lem><rdg wit="#A">sudəm ca: palarahasəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sudəm· palarahasəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">sudəm palarahasəm·</rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="d"><app><lem wit="#A #B">na</lem><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">karotu</lem><rdg wit="#A #C">karroteḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">roteḥ</rdg></app> gurumukhe.</l>
. </lg>
.
555 <p xml:id="siksaGuru_04.03"><app><lem type="conj">kaliṅanya</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">ṅaranya, kaliṅanya</rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">ālekhyam</term> ṅaranya, hayvānurat-nurat ləmah, hayvānura<pb edRef="#B" n="17r"/>t salə, ṅuniveh śarīranta, yan pasevaka ri saṅ guru,
. <app><lem wit="#C">apan</lem><rdg wit="#A">apannya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Apan</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">hana</lem><rdg wit="#B">pina</rdg></app> vvaṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">sulakṣaṇa</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">nulakṣana</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">agələm</lem><rdg wit="#B">AkəL̥m·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hagləm·</rdg></app>
560 <app><lem type="emn">tumulis-tulis</lem><rdg wit="#A">tamuləs taləs·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">tumulis·tulis· tumus·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">tu<del>ma</del>ləs</rdg></app> pupūnya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">yan</lem><rdg wit="#B">tan</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ya</rdg></app> paṅucap lavan saṅ guru,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">hasitam</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">Asithəm</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Asitəm</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hasitəm·</rdg></app> tan
. <app><lem type="emn">paguyvan-guyvan</lem><rdg wit="#A">paguyvan-gayvan</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">paguyu-guyuna</rdg></app>, ri
. <app><lem wit="#A">harəpən</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">sanḍi</rdg></app> saṅ guru, ṅuniveh
565 <app><lem wit="#B">abañol</lem><rdg wit="#A">Abañvala</rdg><rdg wit="#C">habañval·</rdg></app>,
. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="emn">gītam</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">gətəm</rdg></app></term> tan
. <app><lem wit="#A">paṅiduṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">pataṅiduṁ</rdg></app>, denya tan
. <app><lem wit="#A">pamikvanvakən</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">paməkən</rdg></app> kavijakṣaṇaan*,
. <app><lem wit="#A">yar</lem><rdg wit="#B #C"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> tan
570 <app><lem wit="#B">kinvan</lem><rdg wit="#A">kinva</rdg><rdg wit="#C">akon·</rdg></app> de saṅ guru,
. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">jr̥mbhanam</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">jraḥbhanəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">jrəbanəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">jrambhanəm·</rdg></app></term> tan paṅucap
. <app><lem type="norm">lapā</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">lapa</rdg><rdg wit="#C">pa</rdg></app> varəg ri harəpə<pb edRef="#A" n="11r"/>n saṅ guru,
. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="conj">kaṇṭhāra<pb edRef="#B" n="17v"/>vam</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">kadaranəm</rdg><rdg wit="#C">kaḍa<unclear>ra</unclear>nəm·</rdg></app></term>, tan
. <app><lem type="emn">paṅhvab</lem><rdg wit="#A">paṅvamka</rdg><rdg wit="#B">paṅvambha</rdg><rdg wit="#C">paṅomka</rdg></app>,
575 <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem wit="#A"><sic>akadanəm</sic></lem><rdg wit="#B">Akadaranəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hakadaranəm·</rdg></app></term> tan paṅulet ri harəpən saṅ guru, <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><sic>sudəm</sic> phalarahasyam</term> tan
. <app><lem type="emn">paṅucap aṅkara</lem><rdg wit="#A">paṅucapa:kar</rdg><rdg wit="#B">paṅucap aṁkar</rdg><rdg wit="#C">paṅucapa:kar</rdg></app> ri harəpən saṅ guru, ṅuniveh mikvanvakən namaniṅ mañal, hila-hila maṅkana,
. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="emn">na karotu</lem><rdg wit="#A">na ka2teḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kvateḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">karoteḥ</rdg></app> gurumukhe</term> ṅaranya, nihan
. <app><lem wit="#A">kaliṅanya</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">tan· linanya</rdg></app>, tar magavayakəna saṅ sevaka dharma.</p>
. <listApp type="parallels">
580 <app>
. <note corresp="SMG_09.02">Cf. <ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSasanaMahaguru.xml#sasanaMahaguru_09.02">SMG 9.2</ref>.</note>
. </app>
.</listApp>
.
585 <p xml:id="siksaGuru_04.04">nihan ta <pb edRef="#B" n="18v"/> dharmaśikṣā ṅaranya,</p>
.
. <lg xml:id="siksaGuru_04.05" xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="1"><app><lem type="emn">śalākāñjanam</lem><rdg wit="#A">sellajanəm</rdg><rdg wit="#B">selakajanəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">selakacanəm·</rdg></app> suravile,
. <app><lem type="emn">paṇadantagharsādhyasta</lem><rdg wit="#A">panadartaga:svaḍyus</rdg><rdg wit="#B">panadan·tagar sodya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">paṁnadantaga, svaḍyu</rdg></app>
590 <app><lem wit="#A">ceva</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">cava</rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="2"><app><lem type="norm">maprayāsamagama</lem><rdg wit="#A">maprayasamagama:</rdg><rdg wit="#B">maprayasamaṁgama</rdg><rdg wit="#C">maprayaṣamagama</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ceva masva ceva mibuḥ</lem><rdg wit="#B">cava<unclear reason="eccentric_ductus">ma</unclear>so <space type="binding-hole"/>sevavibu</rdg><rdg wit="#C">cava maso ceva, vibu</rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="3"><app><lem wit="#A" rend="check">kramaviduḥ ceva nervayude, uddatayudena kaləm suparigrahaste</lem><rdg wit="#B">kṛmavidu cavanevayurde, <unclear reason="eccentric_ductus">E</unclear>da<add place="below">ta</add>yudena kaL̥m syurigrhas·taḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">kramavidu cava nevayude, Udatayudena ta<del>m</del>L̥m· suparigrahastaḥ</rdg></app>.</l>
. </lg>
595
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_04.06">kaliṅanya,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">śalākāñjanam</term></lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">selajanəm·</rdg></app> ta<pb edRef="#A" n="11v"/>n
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">pacələkan</lem><rdg wit="#C">pacləka</rdg></app> ri harəpən saṅ guru, ri harəpən
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">astri</lem><rdg wit="#A">Asti</rdg></app> laraṅan, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">suravile</term> tan
600 <app><lem type="emn">pakrala<pb edRef="#C" n="11v"/>-krala</lem><rdg wit="#A">pakrale-krale</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pakrola</rdg><rdg wit="#C">pakrela-krela</rdg></app> yar paṅucap ṅuniveh yan pasila,
. <app><lem type="emn">tan lepana</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">lepana</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">tan</lem><rdg wit="#C">yan</rdg></app> pavədakan,
. <app><lem wit="#B">yan</lem><rdg wit="#A">yar</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ya</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">baturan</lem><rdg wit="#B">baturrana</rdg></app> saṅ guru, ṅuniveh mijil
605 <app><lem wit="#A">valaharnya</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">valahanya</rdg></app> panti, asvāgata
. <app><lem wit="#A">kunaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">kunə</rdg><rdg wit="#C">kunəṁ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">dantagharsā</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">dartaga</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">den·taga</rdg></app>, tan pasusur yan paṅucap lavan saṅ guru,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">adhyasta</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">Aḍyasta</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Adyus·ta</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hadyusta</rdg></app> tan
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">pahyasniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">pahyaṁ sni</rdg></app> memen,
610 <app><lem type="norm">agəṇḍiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">Agdəḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Agədiṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hagədiṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">kecaka</lem><rdg wit="#C">keñcaka</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">hārahataḥ</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">ha2hataḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Arva:hataḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">harohataḥ</rdg></app> tan pavaja
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">savilah</lem><rdg wit="#B">salivaḥ</rdg></app>*,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">prayāsa<pb edRef="#B" n="19r"/>māgama</term></lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">prəyasamagama</rdg></app>, tan padələan lavan
615 <app><lem wit="#B">astri</lem><rdg wit="#A">Astra</rdg><rdg wit="#C">stri</rdg></app> laraṅan, ṅuniveh
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">astri</lem><rdg wit="#A">Astra</rdg></app> saṅ guru, mava ivak
. <app><lem wit="#A">sama</lem><rdg wit="#B">masaḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">masa</rdg></app> dagiṅ, tan paṅabhyāsa paṅan inum, ri harəpən saṅ guru, ya ika
. <app><lem wit="#C">sinaṅ<pb edRef="#A" n="12r"/>guh</lem><rdg wit="#A">sinaguḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sinəguḥ</rdg></app> dharmaśikṣā ṅaranya, kayatnakəna saṅ sevaka dharma.</p>
. <listApp type="parallels">
620 <app>
. <note corresp="SMG_10.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSasamaMahaguru.xml#sasanaMahaguru_10.02">SMG 10.2</ref>.</note>

. </listApp>
. </div>
625
. <div type="chapter" n="5" xml:id="siksaGuru_05">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Footsole of the Teacher</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_05.01"><app><lem wit="#A">nihan</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">nihan· ta</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#C">kapiṅlimanya</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">kapilimanya</rdg></app> sih saṅ paṇḍita, ri saṅ sevaka dharma, ndya ya, nihan.</p>
630
. <lg xml:id="siksaGuru_05.02" xml:lang="san-Latn" met="anuṣṭubh">
. <l n="a"><pb edRef="#B" n="19v"/><app><lem type="emn">gurutalam</lem><rdg wit="#A">garugaləṁ:m·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">gurutayəm</rdg><rdg wit="#C">gurutalpaka</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">pravakṣyāmi</lem><rdg wit="#A">pravaksyami</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">pravakasyami</rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="b"><app><lem type="emn">mahāyānam</lem><rdg wit="#A #C">mahayanəm</rdg><rdg wit="#B">mahanəm·</rdg></app>
635 <app><lem type="emn" rend="check">hyatistanti</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">hyistati</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hyatasṭati</rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="c"><app><lem rend="check" wit="#A #B">durbhage hinar<pb edRef="#C" n="12r"/>sabekṣaḥ</lem><rdg wit="#C">dur, bagehinasaḥ bekṣyaḥ</rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="d"><app><lem type="emn">sakābhyāsa</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">byapa</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">praṇamyāsīt</lem><rdg wit="#A">pranamyaseth·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">R̥namyaset·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">panamyaśet</rdg></app>.</l>
. </lg>
640
.
. <!--hana mahita vakyam ahi, siṁha<unclear>rapañagrahate gara</unclear> saṁgasanəm· pratəm· grahate nama-->
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_05.03">ini guru-<app><lem wit="#A">talapakan</lem><rdg wit="#B">talapaka ṅaranya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">talapaka</rdg></app> pravakṣyāmi, umucapan saṅ hyaṅ hayu, <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">mahāyānam</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">mahayanəm·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">hyatisṭanti</lem><rdg wit="#B">hyatinṭan·ti</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hyatinṭanti</rdg></app></term>,
645 <app><lem type="norm">atīta ya</lem><rdg wit="#A">Atita ya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Atisaya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hatisaya</rdg></app> saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">mahādhika</lem><rdg wit="#A">mahaḍika</rdg><rdg wit="#B">mahedita</rdg><rdg wit="#C">mahadika</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">svagata</lem><rdg wit="#A">Asvagata</rdg><rdg wit="#C">svegata</rdg></app> maheśvara,
. <app><lem wit="#A">hulun</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">hana hulun·</rdg></app> hadyan kaniṣṭha madhyamvattama, laki vadvan, ya
. <app><lem type="emn">vataṅakən</lem><rdg wit="#A">vataṁkən</rdg><rdg wit="#B">vatakan</rdg><rdg wit="#C">vata:tan</rdg></app>
650 <app><lem type="norm">sādhyanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">saḍyanya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ṣanḍyanya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ṣaḍyanya</rdg></app> saṅ hyaṅ hayu, vinarah ya ri guru-<app><lem wit="#A">talapakan</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">talapaka</rdg></app> rumuhun, apa <pb edRef="#A" n="12v"/> dumehnya maṅkana, guru
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">tan</lem><rdg wit="#A">ta</rdg></app> magave
. <app><lem type="emn">durbhaga</lem><rdg wit="#A">ḍurbagan·</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">durbagan·</rdg></app>, yan apa ikā, ya tinutakən ikaṅ guru-<app><lem wit="#A">talapakan</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">talapaka</rdg></app>

. <app><lem type="emn">yātah səmbahən</lem><rdg wit="#A">yataḥ sinəmbaḥḥən·kna</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ya ta, səmbhaḥhən·kəna</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ya ta, səmbahan· kna</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">səmbahən</lem><rdg wit="#C">səsəmbahəna</rdg></app> ṅaranya,

. <app><lem type="emn">hīnavākyam</lem><rdg wit="#A">hitavakyim</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">hitavakyam</rdg></app> ahi,</l>
. <l n="b"><app><lem type="norm">siṁharūpañ ca grahaste</lem><rdg wit="#A">siharupañ ca grahaste</rdg><rdg wit="#B">siharupañ ca grahate</rdg><rdg wit="#C">siṁha<unclear>rapañagrahate</unclear></rdg></app>,</l>

675 </lg>
.
.
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_05.05"><term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="emn">anāma</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">Apanama</rdg></app></term> tan kapaṅguh namaniṅ guru, <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">hīnavākyam</lem><rdg wit="#A">hinavakyəm</rdg><rdg wit="#B">hinavaṁkyam·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hinavakyam·</rdg></app></term> tan paṅucap saṅ hyaṅ hayu, tan
. <app><lem wit="#C">upata</lem><rdg wit="#A">nupita</rdg><rdg wit="#B">upəta</rdg></app> saṅ matuha,

. <app><lem wit="#B">pintonakən</lem><rdg wit="#A">pamitvana:kin·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">pinikvenakən·</rdg></app> krodha ri saṅ guru,
. <app><lem type="norm">tan dadi</lem><rdg wit="#A">tar ḍaḍi</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ta nḍi</rdg><rdg wit="#C">tan ḍadi</rdg></app> maṅkana,
. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">saṅ guru saṁghāsanam pr̥tatəm</lem><rdg wit="#A">saṁ guru saṁgasanəm pr̥tatəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">saṁ gurugasanəm·pratatəm·</rdg><witDetail wit="#B" type="ac"/><rdg wit="#B">saṁ guru saṁgasanəm· pratatəm·</rdg><witDetail wit="#B" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#C">laṁguruśaṁgasanəm· praptatəm·</rdg></app></term>

710
. <div type="chapter" n="6" xml:id="siksaGuru_06">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Misfortune of the World (a)</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_06.01">nihan ta
. <app><lem wit="#B">kapiṅgənəpnya</lem><rdg wit="#A">kapignəpnya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">kapiṁnəm·nya</rdg></app> sih
715 <app><lem wit="#A #C">saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> paṇḍita ri saṅ sevaka dharma, ndya ya nihan saṅ hyaṅ jagat-upadrava ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#C">ndya ya<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> nihan</lem><rdg wit="#A">nədyi ya nihan</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> hala tuməmu halanya, hayu tuməmu hayunya, vilu<pb edRef="#B" n="22v"/>t tuməmu vilutnya, bənər tumemu bənərnya, sukha tuməmu sukhanya,
. <app><lem type="norm">duhkha tuməmu duhkhanya</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#B">duka tumamu dukanya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">duka tuməmu dukanya</rdg></app>, umapa karika sukha-duhkhanikaṅ rat
. <app><lem wit="#A">ka<pb edRef="#C" n="13v"/>baih</lem><witDetail wit="#A" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#A">baiḥka</rdg><witDetail wit="#A" type="ac"/><rdg wit="#B #C">kabeḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/>beh</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ya ta</lem><rdg wit="#B">yan akva</rdg><rdg wit="#C">yan· kva</rdg></app> kita tan hana vaneh, saṅ hyaṅ trikāya
720 <app><lem type="norm">maṇḍala</lem><rdg wit="#A">mandala</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app> pariśuddha, kaliṅanya, apan saṅka ri ulah śabda lava<pb edRef="#A" n="14r"/>n ambək
. <app><lem wit="#A">sukha riya</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">saṁkaniya</rdg></app>, sukha-duhkha
. <app><lem wit="#B">təka riya</lem><rdg wit="#A">riya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">tika riya</rdg></app>, vruh pva kita saṅkaniṅ <pb edRef="#B" n="23r"/> śīla mahala,
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">saṅkanikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="morphological">sakariya</rdg></app> upadrava, mataṅyan śīla rahayu, ya ta
. <app><lem type="emn">gavayakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">ginavaya:kna</rdg><rdg wit="#B">gavayakna ta</rdg><rdg wit="#C">gavəyakna ta</rdg></app>,
725 <app><lem wit="#A #B">yatanya</lem><rdg wit="#C">tan tasyan</rdg></app> tan
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">kopadrava</lem><rdg wit="#A">kvepadrava</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">nahan</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">nihan</rdg></app> ta jagat-upadrava ṅaranya, kayatnakəna saṅ sevaka dharma.</p>
. </div>
.
730 <div type="chapter" n="7" xml:id="siksaGuru_07">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Four Powers (i)</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_07.01"><app><lem wit="#B">nihan ta</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="lexical">hana</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hana ya</rdg></app> kapiṅpitunya sih saṅ paṇḍi<pb edRef="#B" n="23v"/>ta, ri saṅ sevaka dharma, saṅ hyaṅ caduśakti saṅ paṇḍita ṅaranya, apa
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">kari</lem><rdg wit="#C">karikṣa</rdg></app> mataṅyan
. <app><lem type="norm">cadu-śakti</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">cadusakti</rdg><rdg wit="#C">cadasak·ti</rdg></app> ṅaranya, pat śakti ṅaranya, bisanya, ya ta pinakasañjata saṅ paṇḍita, ndya ya nihan, cakra
735 <app><lem wit="#A #B">jalakuna</lem><rdg wit="#C">jalakunaṁ</rdg></app>, cakra jalapakṣa, cakra
. <app><lem type="emn">sambharaṇa</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">sambhirana</rdg></app>, cakra
. <app><lem type="norm">ta<pb edRef="#A" n="14v"/>raṅgabāhu</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">taraṁgabahu</rdg><rdg wit="#B">taraṁgabahu, cakra si tarupaḥ, cakra si Atala pakṣa, cakra si sakuR̥b</rdg></app>.</p>
. <listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
740 <note corresp="SMG_14.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSasamaMahaguru.xml#sasanaMahaguru_14.01">Cf. SMG 14.1</ref>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.
. <!--nihan· lvirnya, hanu paṅupadrava saṁ paṇḍita, I
745<lb n="14r2" break="no"/>rikaṁ saṁ manadana, migəl saṁ manadana riṁ patala, jalakunaṁ, paṅupad<space type="binding-hole"/>rava saṁ paṇḍita, di vkasniṁ pata:la, di saṁ manadana, I sor patniṁ manada
.<lb n="14r3" break="no"/>na, ri pala, huməgəl ta ya riṁ tasik ṣuməḶm· riṁ pusə<del rend="ui">m</del>ran masagara<space type="binding-hole"/>ya jalapakṣa paṅupadrava saṁ paṇḍita, Irikaṁ samudra patnika saṁ manadana
.<lb n="14r4"/>saka ri samudra, Uməgil ta ya riṁ tlor kidul· kulven· vetan·, Umagal ta ya ri <unclear>vasiṁṅa</unclear>ruhur, ya cakra taraṅgabahu paṅupadrava <unclear>saṁ paṇḍita-->
.
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_07.02">nihan lvirnya,
750 <app><lem wit="#A">an upadrava</lem><rdg wit="#B">Anupa Upadrava</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hanu paṅupadrava</rdg></app> saṅ paṇḍita,<pb edRef="#B" n="24r"/> irikaṅ saṅ mānadhana,
. <app><lem type="emn">umigəl</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">Uməgəl</rdg><rdg wit="#C">migəl</rdg></app> saṅ mānadhana ri
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">patala</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="morphological">tala</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">jalakuna</lem><rdg wit="#C">jalakunaṁ</rdg></app> paṅupadrava saṅ paṇḍita
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">ri</lem><rdg wit="#A">di</rdg></app> vəkasniṅ patala, <foreign xml:lang="osn-Latn">di</foreign> saṅ mānadhana, i svar
755 <app><lem wit="#B">pat ri</lem><rdg wit="#A #C">patniṁ</rdg></app> saṅ mānadhana, ri
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">patala</lem><rdg wit="#C" cause="eye-skip">pala</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">umigəl</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">Uməgəl</rdg><rdg wit="#C">huməgəl</rdg></app> ta ya ri tasik, sumələm ri pusəran maṅsāgara, ya jalapakṣa
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">paṅupadrava</lem><rdg wit="#A">paṅupava</rdg></app> saṅ paṇḍita,
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">irikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">Irəkəṁ</rdg></app> samudra, patnikaṅ saṅ mānadhana, saka ri
760 <app><lem wit="#B #C">samudra</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="lexical">sagara</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">umigəl</lem><rdg wit="#A">Umləgil</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Uməgəl</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> ta ya ri lvar kidul kulvan vetan,
. <app><lem type="omitted_elsewhere">ya cakra
. <app><lem type="emn">sambharaṇa</lem><rdg wit="#A">sambhirana:</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sabirana</rdg></app> paṅupadrava saṅ paṇḍita, irikaṅ lvar
. <app><lem wit="#B">kidul kulon</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="eye-skip">kiḍulvan·</rdg></app> vetan,
765 <app><lem wit="#B">ya patniṅ saṅ mānadhana, saṅka ri lvar kidul kulon vetan</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app></lem><witDetail wit="#A #B" type="retained"/><note type="altLem">ya cakra...vetan</note><rdg wit="#C" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">umigəl</lem><rdg wit="#C">Umagal</rdg></app> ta ya ri
. <app><lem wit="#A">vəkasniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">vəkasna</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><unclear>vasiṁṅa</unclear></rdg></app> i ruhur, ya cakra taraṅga<pb edRef="#A" n="15r"/>bahu paṅupaḍrava saṅ paṇḍita, ri vəkasniṅ i ruhur, syuh <app><lem wit="#B #C">gəsəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">gəsiṁ</rdg></app> kapravasa ika vəkasniṅ i ruhur,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">de</lem><rdg wit="#C">deniṁ</rdg></app> sañjata saṅ paṇḍita,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">i svar i luhur, makuliliṅan</lem><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>.</p>
770
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_07.03">nihan
. <app><lem wit="#C">lvirnika</lem><rdg wit="#A">lvarnya,nikaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">lvirnyanikaṁ</rdg></app> saṅ hyaṅ caduśakti <app><lem wit="#C">pinakasañjata</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥkasañjata</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pinakañjata</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#B">saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #C">sa</rdg></app> paṇḍita, pəpək pənuh
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">ikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">Ikaṁ</rdg></app> bhuvana, <foreign xml:lang="osn-Latn">di</foreign> deśāntara de saṅjata, kaliṅanya, yatna molah, yatna
775 <app><lem wit="#A">mañabda</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">sabda</rdg><rdg wit="#C" cause="morphological">ñabda</rdg></app>, yatna
. <app><lem wit="#C">māmbək</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="morphological">mambhaka:n·</rdg><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">Ambhək·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">ya ta mataṅyan</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="eye-skip">yatanya</rdg></app> tar kopadrava, ya ta sinaṅguh saṅ hyaṅ cadu-śakti, ya
. <app><lem wit="#C">vəkasnika</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">vkasnikaṁ</rdg></app> saṅ paṇḍita,
. <app><lem wit="#A">yatnakəna</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">yatna-yatna</rdg></app> saṅ sevaka dharma.</p>
780
. </div>
. <div type="chapter" n="8" xml:id="siksaGuru_08">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Three Pacifying Bodily Domains</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_08.01">ndah nihan
785 <app><lem type="norm">arthya</lem><rdg wit="#A">Artya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">An·tyata</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hantyanta</rdg></app> yuktiniṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">vuvusakənaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">vuvus·kna</rdg><rdg wit="#B">vuvus·kəna</rdg><rdg wit="#C">vu<unclear>vu</unclear>s·, knaṅ</rdg></app> vvaṅ kadi kita, vvaṅ tuməkakən ikaṅ saṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">mahyun</lem><rdg wit="#C">mahyaṁn·</rdg></app> vruh hyaṅ<pb edRef="#A" n="15v"/>nika goravanika, saṅ hyaṅ dharmaviśeṣa, mvaṅ mūla patiniṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">janma samaṅke</lem><rdg wit="#A">teja samake</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ter jan·ma samaṁke</rdg><rdg wit="#C">tejan· liṁ samaṁka</rdg></app>,<pb edRef="#C" n="15r"/> mataṅyan
. <app><lem type="norm">umaṅguhakən</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">Umaguḥhakən</rdg><rdg wit="#C">Umiguhakən</rdg></app> saṅ hyaṅ
790 <app><lem type="norm">ratnopadeśa</lem><rdg wit="#A">ratnapaḍesa</rdg><rdg wit="#B">rat·nopadesa</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ratna: padesa</rdg></app>, saka ri hyaṅ matuha, hana saṅ hyaṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">tri<pb edRef="#B" n="26r"/>kāyo</lem><rdg wit="#A #B #C">trikayo</rdg></app>paśānta ṅaranya, ya prihən kayatnakəna təmən, apan sira mūla
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">hala lavan</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="haplography">halavan</rdg></app> hayu, sukha-duhkhanikaṅ janma samaṅke, anvan ta kitaṅ vvaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">pinaten</lem><rdg wit="#B">tinapen·</rdg></app> sinəmpal, rinampas dinval rāmanya, renanya, sinuvar kadaṅnya, <app><lem wit="#A #B">kahava-hava</lem><rdg wit="#C" cause="morphological">kahavaha</rdg></app> rāmanya ri thāni, apa
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">dumehnya</lem><rdg wit="#B">dumeḥ ya</rdg></app> maṅkana, tar prayatna

. <app><lem wit="#B #C">kaliṅanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅa</rdg></app>, tar
. <app><lem wit="#A">ka<pb edRef="#A" n="16r"/>raṇanya, maṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#B">karanyaṁguḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">karananyaṁguḥ</rdg></app> ikaṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">pāpa saṅsāra</lem><rdg wit="#A">papa: <add place="below">sasara</add></rdg><rdg wit="#B">papa saṁra</rdg><rdg wit="#C">papa saṅgara</rdg></app> magəṅ ika ta, maṅkana kapva pukulun,
. <app><lem type="norm">kopadrava denika</lem><rdg wit="#A">kvapadrava ḍeni:ka</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kvapadravanika</rdg><rdg wit="#C">drava denikaṁ</rdg></app>, saṅ hyaṅ
800 <app><lem type="norm">trikāya paśānta</lem><rdg wit="#A">tr̥kayva pasanta</rdg><rdg wit="#B">trikayva pasan·ta</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><unclear>saṁ hyaṁ</unclear> <gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/>ri <gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/></rdg></app> <pb edRef="#C" n="15v"/> kapva kaṅ janma mataṅyan tar
. <app><lem wit="#B">pahiṅan gəṅniṅ upadrava</lem><rdg wit="#A">pahiṅani:ṁ papa:, paṅupaḍrava</rdg><rdg wit="#C">pahiṅaniṁṅ upadrava</rdg></app> riṅ rat, nyāpan tahan kva liṅanta.</p>

. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_08.02">nihan ta kami
. <app><lem wit="#A">mavarahakəna ri kita</lem><rdg wit="#B">mavarahakəna ri tita</rdg><rdg wit="#C">mavarahan<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="3"/></rdg></app>, hana
805 <app><lem type="norm">jñāna</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">ñana</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app> paśānta, karma paśānta, śabda paśānta,
. <app><lem wit="#C">jñāna</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">ñana</rdg></app> pasanta, ṅaranya, ambək rahayu, tan kira-kira riṅ rat mvaṅ tan padadyakəna duhkhaniṅ len, ṅuniveh tan padadyakəna harohara ri bhuvana, ya ta sinaṅguh
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">jñāna</lem><rdg wit="#B">ñana</rdg></app> paśānta, ṅaranya, karma paśānta ṅaranya, ulah yogya, ulah rahayu<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ulah yukti, tan <pb edRef="#A" n="16v"/>
. <app><lem type="emn">paḍaṇḍakara</lem><rdg wit="#A">paḍaḍakara</rdg><rdg wit="#B">padadakara</rdg><rdg wit="#C">padaḍakara</rdg></app> ta<pb edRef="#B" n="27v"/>n padadyakəna
. <app><lem type="norm">pahalaniṅ rat</lem><rdg wit="#A">pala:niṁ rath·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">halani rata</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ti hala, ri rat·</rdg></app>, ya
810 <app><lem wit="#B">sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#A #C">sinaguḥ</rdg></app> karma paśānta ṅaranya,

. <app><lem type="norm">pati-duhkhaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">pati ḍukaniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">patni dukaniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">pativukaniṁ</rdg></app> len, ṅuniveh <app><lem wit="#B #C">ry avaknya</lem><rdg wit="#A">niṁ vaknya</rdg></app>, ya śabda paśānta ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">tri</lem><rdg wit="#A">tra</rdg></app> ṅaraniṅ təlu,

815 <app><lem wit="#A #B">maṅdadyakən</lem><rdg wit="#C">madadyakna</rdg></app> enak ambəknikaṅ rat, yan kagəgə denira, tan kopadrava ikaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">janma</lem><rdg wit="#B">jama</rdg></app> vvaṅ yan
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">maṅkana</lem><rdg wit="#B">makana</rdg></app>.</p>

. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_08.03">ri sədəṅnya
820 <app><lem wit="#B #C">kagəgə</lem><rdg wit="#A">tagəgə</rdg></app> halanira, halanira ṅaranya, ikaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">tri-mala</lem><rdg wit="#A">tramala</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">tri-mala</lem><rdg wit="#A">tramala</rdg></app>, ṅaranya, tri-duṣṭa,
. <app><lem wit="#A">nihan lvirnya</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">ndya lvirnya nihan</rdg></app>, ñāna duṣṭa, karma duṣṭa, śabda duṣṭa, ñāna duṣṭa ṅaranya, ambək
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">kumira-kirakən</lem><rdg wit="#C">kumira-mirakən·</rdg></app> ri paḍanya janma,
825 <app><lem wit="#A">ṅahanakən</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅaranya ṅahanakəna</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ṅahanakna</rdg></app> <pb edRef="#A" n="17r"/>
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">laraniṅ le<pb edRef="#B" n="28v"/>n</lem><rdg wit="#A">lan</rdg></app>, madadyakən
. <app><lem wit="#A">haroharaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">ha2hara ri</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ha:roharani</rdg></app> bhuvana, ya ta sinaṅguh ñāna duṣṭa
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, karma duṣṭa ṅaranya, ulah tar yogya, ulah mahala,<pb edRef="#C" n="16v"/> ulah tar yukti,
. <app><lem wit="#A">maṅdadyakən</lem><rdg wit="#B">maṁdadyakna</rdg><rdg wit="#C">madadyakna</rdg></app> haroharaniṅ bhuvana, ṅuniveh
830 <app><lem type="norm">maṅdadyakən</lem><rdg wit="#A">maṁdadyakna</rdg><rdg wit="#B">maṁdadyakəna</rdg><rdg wit="#C">madadyakən</rdg></app> duhkha pati ri paḍanya janma, ndah lvirnya, amaliṅ<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> anumpu, aṅracun<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem type="norm">aṅabhicāri</lem><rdg wit="#A">Aṅencari</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Aṁṅabicari</rdg><rdg wit="#C">Abṅəcuri</rdg></app>, mahabət,
. <app><lem type="emn">anurāga</lem><rdg wit="#A #C">Anaraga</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><note>Ms. <ptr target="#B"/> has a huge omission gap until the section <foreign>daśa-mala</foreign>.</note></app>, mraṅ <app><lem wit="#C">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">mvaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> tan paḍvasa, savetniṅ harəpnya drabya sukha, ya sinaṅguh karma duṣṭa,
. <app><lem type="norm">śabda dusta ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#A #B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#C">sabda dusṭa ṅaranya</rdg></app>, śabda tan enak karəṅə̄, maṅdadyakən durbala, ri paḍanya janma, lvirnya, amisuh
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">atimburu</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>*, anaṅguh naraka, īrṣya ri paḍanya janma, a<pb edRef="#A" n="17v"/>naṅguh nəluh tar nəluh<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> anaṅguh maliṅ tar maliṅ, anaṅguh musuh tar musuh, anaṅguh duṣṭa <foreign xml:lang="osn-Latn">di</foreign> saṅ sādhu,
835 <app><lem type="norm">vākcapa<pb edRef="#C" n="17r"/>la</lem><rdg wit="#A">vak·campala</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#C"><unclear>vakapa</unclear></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">vākpārusya</lem><rdg wit="#A">parusyi</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#C">paru<del>na</del></rdg></app>, ya sinaṅguh śabda duṣṭa ṅaranya, ya sinaṅguh trimala ṅaranya, ñana duṣṭa pva pinakāmbəkniṅ vvaṅ, karma duṣṭa pva pinakolahniṅ vvaṅ, śabda duṣṭa pva pinakaśabdaniṅ vvaṅ, byakta katəmpuhaniṅ jagat upadrava.</p>
.
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_08.04">mapa
. <app><lem wit="#A">saṅ upadrava</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#C">paṅupadrava</rdg></app> ṅaranya, lvirnya, kady aṅganiṅ vuta tuli, vuḍug, vikət,
840 <app><lem wit="#A">kəkəṅ, vuṅkuk</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#C">ṅavukuk·</rdg></app>, səkəl, vuta
. <app><lem wit="#A">salaya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#C">sak·ya</rdg></app>*,
. <app><lem wit="#A">salvir vikāraniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#C">salvirni vikara riṅ</rdg></app> avak rūpanya, ṅuniveh taṅ kərəṅan*, sakvehniṅ bhīmarūpa, ya pāpa ṅaranya, <foreign xml:lang="osn-Latn">mana</foreign> pā<pb edRef="#A" n="18r"/>pa ginavayakənya taṅ ñāna duṣṭa, karma duṣṭa, śabda duṣṭa, kady aṅganiṅ maliṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#C">ahabət</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="morphological">ṅahabət·</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, ṅaracun, anəluh, ika
. <app><lem wit="#A">ginavayakənya</lem><rdg wit="#B">vəvəya:kənya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">ginavəyakən·</rdg></app>, mati pva kita <pb edRef="#C" n="17v"/> təmahan
845 <app><lem wit="#A">tətək</lem><rdg wit="#B"> tətək:u</rdg><rdg wit="#C">təktək·</rdg></app> ulər, vəḍit, lintah,
. <app><lem type="emn">lakay</lem><rdg wit="#A">lantey·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">lan·tay·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">latay·</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> hiris pvah,
. <app><lem wit="#A">lakay əlur</lem><rdg wit="#B #C"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, salvirniṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">janma</lem><rdg wit="#C">j·ma</rdg></app> kinaririsan, ya sinaṅguh pāpa
. <app><lem wit="#B">ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#A #C"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
850 <app><lem wit="#A">tipniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">təpniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">tapna</rdg></app> kavah ṅaranya, ya salaha, ilagana
. <app><lem wit="#A">təmən</lem><rdg wit="#B">təmən· təmən·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">təmən-təmən:a</rdg></app> teka saṅ paṇḍita,
. <app><lem wit="#B">aparan ya</lem><rdg wit="#A">saparan ya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">haparan ya</rdg></app> gavayakəna.</p>

. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_08.05"><app><lem wit="#A #B">Om</lem><rdg wit="#C">ña maṅkana</rdg></app> saṅ hyaṅ
855 <app><lem type="norm">trikāyopaśānta</lem><rdg wit="#A">trakayvapasanta</rdg><rdg wit="#B">trikayvapasanta</rdg><rdg wit="#C">krətayopaśanta</rdg></app> <pb edRef="#B" n="31r"/> atah ika
. <app><lem type="norm">abhyāsanta</lem><rdg wit="#A">sabyasanta</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Abyasanta</rdg><rdg wit="#C">habyasanta</rdg></app>, mvaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A #C">lagi-laginta</lem><rdg wit="#B">lagə-lagəta</rdg></app>, apan maṅke hələm-hələmniṅ hələm, saṅ hyaṅ trikāyopaśānta atah ika gəgənta,<pb edRef="#A" n="18v"/> ya ta pinakaparahu,
. <app><lem type="norm">pinakabahitra</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥkabaheṭā</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pinakabaheṭā</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><del rend="ui">pa</del>naka bah<add place="below">e</add>tra</rdg></app>, pinakabanava, makaparahu ñāna paśānta, maka<app><lem wit="#A #C" rend="hyphenleft">banava</lem><rdg wit="#B">bava</rdg></app> karma paśānta, maka<app><lem type="norm" rend="hyphenleft">bahitra</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">baheṭā</rdg><rdg wit="#C">bahetra</rdg></app> śabda
. <app><lem type="norm">paśānta</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">pasanta</rdg><rdg wit="#C">pasta</rdg></app>, sira ta saṅ sādhu jāti
860 <app><lem wit="#A #B">ṅaranira</lem><rdg wit="#C">ṅaranya</rdg></app>, sira saṅ <pb edRef="#B" n="31v"/>
. <app><lem type="norm">yogīśvara</lem><rdg wit="#A">yvagi:svara</rdg><rdg wit="#B">jvagisvara</rdg><rdg wit="#C">yogisvera</rdg></app> <pb edRef="#C" n="18r"/>
. <app><lem wit="#A">ṅaranira</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">ṅaranya</rdg></app>, sira saṅ paṇḍita, saṅ viku ṅaranira, mapa ruktinika,
. <app><lem wit="#A">livat ta ya</lem><rdg wit="#B">vilavan·kuya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">viralaga, <unclear>kuha</unclear></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">pinakapariṇāma</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥkaparinama</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pinaka parinaka, parinama</rdg><rdg wit="#C">pinakaparinaku, parinama</rdg></app> de saṅ paṇḍita.</p>

. <div type="chapter" n="9" xml:id="siksaGuru_09">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Ten Defilements (a)</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_09.01">ndah nihan
875 <app><lem wit="#B">yuktinya</lem><rdg wit="#A #C">yaktinya</rdg></app>,</p>
.
. <lg xml:id="siksaGuru_09.02" xml:lang="san-Latn" met="pādānuṣṭubh">
. <l n="a"><app><lem wit="#A #B">vigataḥ</lem><rdg wit="#C">pinakaḥ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">kleśapāpe ’smin</lem><rdg wit="#A">klesapesmin·</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">klesa papesmin·</rdg></app>,</l>
880 <l n="b"><app><lem wit="#A #B">vigataḥ</lem><rdg wit="#C">vigakaḥ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="conj">sarvaduhkhinaḥ</lem><rdg wit="#A">maraduknaḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">maladukənaḥ</rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="c">kurvanti <app><lem type="norm">kuśalam mahat</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">kusalamahat·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">kusala hata</rdg></app>.</l>
. </lg>
.
885 <p xml:id="siksaGuru_09.03">kaliṅanya<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> vənaṅa ta
. <app><lem type="emn">śumuddhakən</lem><rdg wit="#A">sumiḍakən</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">sumidakən·</rdg></app> taṅ daśa-kleśa, yar dataṅ ri <pb edRef="#B" n="32r"/> kita, nyaṅ doṣa,
. <app><lem wit="#C">moha</lem><rdg wit="#A">mvah</rdg><rdg wit="#B">mvaha</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">drəmba</lem><rdg wit="#A"><add place="below">dəm·</add>ba</rdg><rdg wit="#B">dəmbha</rdg><rdg wit="#C">damba</rdg></app>, lobha, <app><lem type="emn">mātsarya</lem><rdg wit="#A">matṣayya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">məta, makṣarya</rdg><rdg wit="#C">mətta, matsayya</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm">abhimāna</lem><rdg wit="#A">Ambhimana</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Abimana</rdg><rdg wit="#C">habimana</rdg></app>,
890 <app><lem type="norm">mūrkha</lem><rdg wit="#A #C">murka</rdg><rdg wit="#B">marraka</rdg></app>,<pb edRef="#A" n="19r"/> kuhaka,
. *<app><lem type="norm">sambhinnapralāpa</lem><rdg wit="#A">sambhinapralapa:</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sibinapralapa</rdg><rdg wit="#C">sibinapralapa</rdg></app>, peśuna.</p>
. <listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="SMG_05.02">Cf. <ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSasanaMahaguru.xml#sasanaMahaguru_05.02">SMG 5.2</ref>.</note>
895 </app>
. </listApp>
.
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_09.04"><app><lem wit="#C">kaliṅanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">ka,</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kaliṅanya ṅaranya</rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">doṣa</lem><rdg wit="#A">thvasa</rdg><rdg wit="#B">dvasa</rdg><rdg wit="#C">dosa</rdg></app></term> ṅaranya, puji-puji sukha, puji-puji vihikan, puji-puji
. <app><lem type="norm">vīrya</lem><rdg wit="#A">virya</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">parya</rdg></app>, ya sinaṅguh doṣa ṅaranya, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">moha</term> ṅaranya, tan pagavaya
900 <app><lem wit="#A #B">sih</lem><rdg wit="#C">siha</rdg></app> ri paḍanya janma,
. <app><lem type="norm">drə<pb edRef="#C" n="33r"/>mba ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#A #B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#C">da:mba ṅaranya</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">jənək iṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">jinəkə:ṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">jənəkaṁ</rdg></app> paṅan inum
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">bvat</lem><rdg wit="#C">abvat</rdg></app> turu, tan
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">akiṅkin</lem><rdg wit="#C">akiṁkiṁ</rdg></app>
905 <app><lem type="norm">hitāvasānaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">hitavasaniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">hitavasa</rdg></app> janma, ya
. <term xml:lang="kaw-Latn"><app><lem type="emn">drəmba</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">dəmbha</rdg><rdg wit="#C">dambha</rdg></app></term> ṅaranya, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">lobha</term> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">kveh</lem><rdg wit="#A">kvaḥ</rdg></app> ulah tar sopacara,
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">ya lobha ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><note>After the word <foreign>lobha</foreign>, <ptr target="#B"/> and <ptr target="#C"/> contain the description of <foreign>məta</foreign>. Ms. <ptr target="#B"/> contains the reading: <foreign>məta ṅaranya, AvəR̥ deniṁ su<g type="dandaNotch">§</g>kanya, AvərR̥ deniṁ prajñanya, AvəR̥ deniṁ gunanya, AvəR̥ deniṁ paṅavraḥnya, ya makṣarya ṅaranya</foreign>; ms. <ptr target="#C"/>: <foreign>havəR̥ ḍeniṁ sukanya, <unclear>A</unclear>vəR̥ ḍeniṁ prajña:na, AvəR̥ deniṁ paṅavruḥnya, havəR̥ d<add place="below">e</add>niṁ gunanya, ya mta ṅaranya</foreign>. The existence of this description makes this concept consist of 11 elements, not 10 as expected. The reason why I rejected this element as correct reading is because of <foreign>məta</foreign> appears as an element in <foreign>daśa-mala</foreign> below § SiGu 10.</note></app>,
. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">mātsarya</lem><rdg wit="#A #C">matṣaryya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">makṣarya</rdg></app></term> ṅaranya, *timburu manon
910 <app><lem wit="#A">rahayu</lem><rdg wit="#B #C">ahayu</rdg></app>,
. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">abhimāna</lem><rdg wit="#A">Ambhimana</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Abimana</rdg><rdg wit="#C">habimana</rdg></app></term> ṅaranya, <app><lem type="emn">bari ya tamtam</lem><rdg wit="#A">bariyuḥ tamtam·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">bari ya taṁtam·</rdg><rdg wit="#C">bariḥyu tama-tama:</rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">mūrkha</term> ṅaranya, tar
. <app><lem wit="#B #C">tolih</lem><rdg wit="#A">koliḥ</rdg></app> ri viśeṣaniṅ janma, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">kuhaka</term> ṅaranya, aṅaku-aku
. <app><lem wit="#C">riṅ guṇa</lem><rdg wit="#A">niṁṅ aguna</rdg><rdg wit="#B">niṁ guna</rdg></app>,
. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">sambhinnapralāpa</lem><rdg wit="#A">sambhinapralapa</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sam·bimanapralapa</rdg><rdg wit="#C">sambinapralapa</rdg></app></term> ṅaranya, aṅayam-ayam dr̥byaniṅ adr̥bya, mvaṅ sukhaniṅ asukha, <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">pe<pb edRef="#A" n="19v"/>śuna</lem><rdg wit="#A">pesuna</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">pisuna</rdg></app></term> ṅara<pb edRef="#C" n="19r"/>nya,
915 <app><lem wit="#A #C">bvat maṅjərum</lem><rdg wit="#B">bvak· majyum·</rdg></app>, ya ta sinaṅguh daśa-kleśa ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A #B">babadan</lem><rdg wit="#C">ña dosa</rdg></app> hilaṅakəna, ikaṅ kleśa maṅkana.</p>
. <listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="SMG_05.03">Cf. <ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSasanaMahaguru.xml#sasanaMahaguru_05.03">SMG 5.3</ref>.</note>
920 </app>
. </listApp>
. </div>

. <div type="chapter" n="10" xml:id="siksaGuru_10">
925 <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">Ten Stains</head>
. <p xml:id="siksaGuru_10.01"><foreign xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem wit="#A #B">viga<pb edRef="#B" n="33v"/>taḥ</lem><rdg wit="#C">vagataḥ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="conj">sarvaduhkhinaḥ</lem><rdg wit="#A">maraḍuknaḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">malaraḍukənaḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#C">mara<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="3"/></rdg></app></foreign>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">vənaṅa kari kita</lem><rdg wit="#B">vnaṁṅata ri kitita</rdg><rdg wit="#C"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/>ṅa kara kita</rdg></app> sami bataṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">mārakarma</lem><rdg wit="#A">maragkarma</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">marakarma</rdg></app>, yar dataṅ ri kita,
930 <app><lem type="norm">mārakarma</lem><rdg wit="#A">maragkarma</rdg><rdg wit="#B">marakarma</rdg><rdg wit="#C">marikarma</rdg></app>, ṅaranya, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">supta</term>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">bhaya</term>,
. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">tandrī</lem><rdg wit="#A">tarḍra</rdg><rdg wit="#B #C">tandri</rdg></app></term>,
. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem wit="#C">kleda</lem><rdg wit="#A">kleḍra</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kelada</rdg></app></term>,
. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">lajjā</lem><rdg wit="#A #C">lajña:</rdg><rdg wit="#B">lajña</rdg></app></term>,
